website_summaries.verdict: From a well-known swim product maker, these earplugs are lightweight and conform to ears to keep out water.
pros: Plugs also good for blocking out sound, music, and for sleeping
cons: Don't work well with swim caps, and putting them in may take practice

customer_reviews.title: 2 for 1!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was right because it had two sets for the price of one. Each set of ear plugs came in their own see thru container. I have been a long distance swimmer for >6 decades and finally, I'm over shaking me head and twisting my neck to clear my ears of pool water. I will miss though, the warm water draining from my ears that marked the last drop of pool water was gone. Speedo does it again;)
customer_reviews.author: Gina K

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my ears as well as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs were purchased for swimming, but water still enters my ears, so am now using in the shower to prevent water entering the ear canal. I seem to get swimmers ear easily in my later years, and am not sure why. I purchased these earplugs to keep from losing my hearing when water gets into my ear canals, and sometimes it takes days before my hearing returns. Very irritating!
customer_reviews.author: laurelleigh

customer_reviews.title: No water in Your ears
customer_reviews.text: These not only prevent 95% of all water influx, but also stay in your ear during heavy surf. The big different that I can see is the satellite dish-shaped element that creates a seal of sorts at the entry of your ear. I have long ear tubes and get clogged and waxy easily. These eliminate the issue.
customer_reviews.author: William Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: and these were great when I used them for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I took these with me on a recent trip to Hawaii and they worked well for my needs. I just can't stand having water in my ears, and these were great when I used them for snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: If no other ear plugs fit you, these will.
customer_reviews.text: The only swim ear plugs that fit my ears! I seem to have ears where no ear plugs will stay put, even the silicone ones you form yourself. This is a complete life saver as water in my ears is extremely uncomfortable and does not come out easily. You do end up paying about $1 for shipping built into the price if you add it up plus account for about 90 cents state tax (in my case). Overall it's still great value and super convenient to be able to buy it here.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the most part they do the job, but I still get water in my ears when swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya VanGemert

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I used these ear plugs as I swim a lot. These are the only ones I have found that don't fall out while swimming. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mac

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They do the job, keep the water out of my ears, and they float, so if I drop them in the pool they're easy to retrieve.
customer_reviews.author: Hall

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: These work well and keep the water out. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: cd3001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work nicely and do not get all dirty like silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Schuessler

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water out of my ears!
customer_reviews.text: For years I had trouble with water not draining from my ears when I swam - now, not a problem - these are terrific and work 100% effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Don Z

customer_reviews.title: They fit pretty good in your ear and they're comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit pretty good in your ear and they're comfortable
customer_reviews.author: nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to wear but sometimes come off when you dive.
customer_reviews.author: MikesMum

product_meta.title: Speedo Ergo Ear Plugs, Silver
product_meta.description: The updated Ergo Ear Plugs are ergonomically designed to offer the closest most secure fit possible. Made of high quality TPR, these are super comfortable and super easy to place in or out of your ear. These reusable plugs come with a handy storage and carrying case to keep them clean and germ free, ready for their next use.
feature_bullets: Speedo FIT Ergo Ear Plugs with Case
Soft and comfortable in PVC free material
Easy to put in and remove
